review.title: “Working for F DOT Services opened up a whole new world for me!”
review.pros: Pros – I learned so much at F DOT...from policy writing to negotiating freight. We did it all and we loved it!
review.cons: Cons – It's so hard to find a good driver!
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The owners are super involved and really listen to their employees - that helps keep up the morale in the office.
